00023 #ifndef _CTK_EXCEPTION_HPP
00024 #define _CTK_EXCEPTION_HPP
00025 
00026 #include <execinfo.h>
00027 #include <errno.h>
00028 #include <stdio.h>
00029 
00030 #include <exception>
00031 #include <stdexcept>
00032 #include <string>
00033 #include <iostream>
00034 
00035 #include "ctk_error.h"
00036 
00041 namespace ctk {
00042 
00046 class Exception : public std::exception {
00047     public:
00048         Exception() : m_msg("") {
00049             void *array[25];
00050             m_symSize  = backtrace(array, 25);
00051             m_symbols = backtrace_symbols(array, m_symSize);
00052         }
00053         Exception(const std::string& msg) : m_msg(msg) { }
00054         ~Exception() throw() { }
00055         virtual const char *what() const throw() { return m_msg.c_str(); }
00056 
00060         virtual const int reason() const throw() { return CTK_ERROR_INTERNAL; }
00061 
00067         void trace(std::ostream &os = std::cout) {
00068             os << "#Exception: " << what() << std::endl;
00069             for (int i = 0; i < m_symSize; i++)
00070                 os << "[trace " << i << "] " << m_symbols[i] << std::endl;
00071         }
00072 
00073     private:
00074         int m_symSize;
00075         char **m_symbols;
00076         std::string m_msg;
00077 };
00078 
00079 class Warning : public Exception {
00080 };
00081 
00082 class Error : public Exception {
00083     public:
00084         Error(int code) : m_code(code) {
00085             ::ctk_strerror_r(code, m_buf, sizeof(m_buf));
00086         }
00087         Error(const char *msg, int code) : m_code(code) {
00088             int ret = ::snprintf(m_buf, sizeof(m_buf)-100, msg);
00089             ::ctk_strerror_r(code, (char*)&m_buf[ret], sizeof(m_buf)-ret);
00090         }
00091         ~Error() throw() { }
00092         const char *what() const throw() { return (const char*)m_buf; }
00093         const int reason() const throw() { return m_code; }
00094 
00095     private:
00096         char m_buf[256];
00097         int m_code;
00098 };
00099 
00100 }; // namespace ctk
00101 
00102 #endif /* _CTK_EXCEPTION_HPP */
